name: No Man's Sky Compiled Settings File
summary: An MBIN file is a binary file that contains settings for No Man's Sky, an exploration and survival video game. No Man's Sky modders create and use MBIN files to modify the game's gameplay, using NMS Modding Station. MBIN files are not meant to be opened; they are meant to be converted to .EXML files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
